start.text: You awaken in a mystical forest. Two paths lie ahead.

left_path.text: You find a talking tree who offers you a Magic Acorn.

tree_reward.text: The acorn glows brightly. You gain +10 health.

decline_tree.text: The tree nods. A hidden path opens.

right_path.text: You stumble into a goblin camp. They notice you.

escape_goblins.text: You barely escape with a few scratches. (-5 health)

fight_goblins.text: You bravely fight. You defeat them and find 10 gold!

ruins.text: The ruins contain a glowing portal and an old merchant.

mystic_lake.text: You reach a glowing lake. A spirit offers guidance.

level_two.text: Level 2: The Shadow Caverns. It's dark and filled with whispers.

lit_path.text: With the torch lit, you see traps and avoid them. You find a glowing rune.

dark_path.text: You trip over rocks and lose health.

deep_cave.text: You reach a fork. A goblin boss blocks the left path.

boss_fight.text: The Goblin Boss growls. Prepare for battle!

hidden_chamber.text: You discover a sealed door with a rune-shaped slot.

unlock_mountain_pass.text: The door opens. A cool breeze welcomes you to the mountain pass.

level_three.text: Level 3: Mountain Pass. The sky darkens. You spot a distant castle.

mountain_cave.text: You find a healing spring inside and restore your health.

castle_gate.text: You arrive at the castle gate. It's locked.

guard_encounter.text: A ghostly guard blocks the way. You must prove your worth.

final_level.text: Final Level: The Dream King's Throne Room. He awaits your arrival.

ending.text: You defeat the Dream King with wit and strength. Peace returns to the realm. You are a hero!
